properties.areaDesc: Leake, MS; Madison, MS; Scott, MS; Rankin, MS
properties.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued February 10 at 2:10PM CST until February 10 at 5:15PM CST by NWS Jackson MS
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a

* Flash Flood Warning for...
Southern Leake County in central Mississippi...
Northeastern Rankin County in central Mississippi...
Northern Scott County in central Mississippi...
Madison County in central Mississippi...

* Until 515 PM CST.

* At 209 PM CST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing
heavy rain across the warned area. Up to one inch of rain has
already fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin
shortly.

HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas,
highways, streets and underpasses as well as other
drainage and low lying areas.

* Some locations that will experience flooding include...
Jackson, Madison, Ridgeland, Canton, Carthage, Harperville, Flora,
Leesburg, Farmhaven, Goshen Springs, Ludlow, Sharon, Forkville,
Pisgah, Branch, Tuscola, Gluckstadt, Steele, Hillsboro and Madden.
properties.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood
deaths occur in vehicles.

CMAMtext: NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 5:15 PM CST. Avoid flooded areas.
